topic: Paradigm-shifting discoveries in the energy sector
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that surprising discoveries often emerge from challenging collective assumptions or exploring overlooked areas. As a next step, I will conduct a survey to gather insights on common expectations and potential blind spots within the relevant community or industry. This will help identify areas where surprising insights might be uncovered, benefiting not only personal understanding but also broader perspectives.

metadata.trigger: What would surprise me if I found it?
